HAL_I2cDescriptor_t Struct Reference

I2C (TWI) access control structure. More...

#include <i2cPacket.h>

Data Fields

HalI2cPacketService_t service
 TWI service field - contains variables for HAL TWI module's internal needs.
I2cChannel_t tty
 tty - TWI_CHANNEL_n to be used. "n" range depends on the platform. See a halTwi.h platform-specific file for more details.
I2cClockRate_t clockRate
 TWI clock rate. See a halTwi.h platform-specific file for more details.
uint8_t id
 Slave's address.
uint16_t length
 The number of bytes to be written to the bus.
uint8_t * data
 Pointer to data.
I2cInternalAddrSize_t lengthAddr
 Specifies the size of address contained in the internalAddr field: HAL_NO_INTERNAL_ADDRESS - byte command protocol (not the combined mode)
HAL_ONE_BYTE_SIZE
HAL_TWO_BYTE_SIZE
HAL_THREE_BYTE_SIZE.
uint32_t internalAddr
 Contains address from device's internal address space.
void(* f )(bool result)
 Callback function. Shall not be set to NULL.
